entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story. He used the Furnunculus Curse.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the main characters in the story. He used a different hex.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the main characters in the story. She used a different hex.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred stepped onto Goyle and into the compartment with his wand out.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George was careful to tread on Malfoy as he followed Fred inside. He used Jelly-Legs.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy was affected by the Furnunculus Curse and Jelly-Legs.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe was affected by the Furnunculus Curse and Jelly-Legs.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle was stepped on by Fred.

relationships.description: Harry used the Furnunculus Curse that affected Malfoy.
Ron used a different hex that affected Crabbe.
Hermione used a different hex that affected Goyle.
Harry used the Furnunculus Curse that affected Crabbe.
